ygData.subject: are there any master fletcher's on this board
ygData.msgSnippet: I also belong to an EQ brewing and Tailoring board, however, those boards are actually active.  I get at least 10 msgs a day on each of the other boards from
ygData.messageBody:
I also belong to an EQ brewing and Tailoring board, however, those boards
are actually active. I get at least 10 msgs a day on each of the other
boards from people answering questions and sharing expertise. I have been
on this board for a week and have only received 2 msgs (which it seems I am
the only one who answered them) and have received no replies regarding my
own post a few days ago about fletching past 160. Are there any Master
fletcher on this board and why is everyone so quiet?
